CAREER SUMMARY  
 
Jan 2016 to Nov 2018  Uniper SE  
 
Dec 201 8 to date  
Position: Deputy Head of the Representative Office  
• Further development of Uniper's positioning in the political sphere.  
• In particular, flanking gas -specific and international topics.  
• Group -wide coordination of political relevant procedures in the cour se of 
implementing the German hydrogen strategy (e.g. Uniper's positioning for a 
new regulatory framework for the development of hydrogen networks).  
• Political support for Uniper's Russia business. Support for individual 
commercial projects, in particular  the Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline; political 
support for the Russian subsidiary Unipro on issues relating to the capacity 
market in the Russian electricity sector.  
• Responsibility for Uniper's membership in the German Eastern Business 
Association and the Ge rman -Russian Forum. Advisor to the Chief Executive 
Officer for his mandates in the German Eastern Business Association 
(Management Board and Presidium). Advisor to the Chairman of the 
Supervisory Board of Uniper for his mandate in the German -Russian Forum 
(Advisory Board).  
• Networking with relevant contacts: Federal Foreign Office, Federal 
Chancellery, Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate Action, German 
    
Parliament, associations, think tanks, foundations, civil society organizations, 
embassies of other states, etc.  
• Coordinator of risk management for the Uniper Corporate Communication and 
Governmental Relations division.  
 
Jan 2016 to Nov 2018  
Position: Senior Policy Advisor  
• Strategic positioning of Uniper in the political sphere. Active flanking of natural 
gas-specific and international issues .  
• Advisor to the Chief Executive Officer and the Chairman of the Supervisory 
Board of Uniper for mandates in the German Eastern Business Association and 
the German -Russian Forum.  
• Political support for Uniper’s business with Russia. Support for individu al 
commercial projects, e.g. Nord Stream 2 gas pipeline project.  
 
Dec 2010 to March 2012 E.ON AG, Düsseldorf  
Position: Policy Advisor, Department Political Affairs & Corporate 
Communications    
• Active political flanking of natural gas -specific topics  in Brussels and Berlin.  
• Energy policy support for individual commercial projects, e.g. Trans Adriatic 
Pipeline ("Southern Gas Corridor").  
 
Sept  2009 to Dec 2010 E.ON Ruhrgas AG, Essen  
Position: Head of German and International Energy Law, European Law and  Gas 
Associations EU  
• Advisor to all departments of the company and its subsidiaries on German and 
international energy law and European law.  
• Advisor and representative of the Chief Legal Officer at meetings of the Legal 
Committee of the Eur ogas Association. Member Eurogas Task Force Security 
of Gas Supply.  
 
Dec 2007 to Sept  2009 Eurogas, Brusseles Senior Manager Legal & Regulatory 
Affairs  
Position: Advisor to the Secretary General and the Deputy Secretary General.  
• Coordinator  and advisor of Eurogas Policy Committees (e.g. Strategy 
Committee, System Users Committee) and Legal Affairs Committee; 
coordinator of political positions in collaboration with member companies.  
• Representative of Eurogas in discussions with EU instituti ons (Commission, 
European Parliament, Council) and other stakeholder groups. Several 
appearances as speaker in the Gas Coordination Group.  
 
Oct 2003 to Dec 2007 E.ON Ruhrgas AG, Essen  
Position: Head of German and International Energy Law, European Law and G as 
Associations EU  
• Advisor to all departments of the company and its subsidiaries on German and 
international energy law and European law.  
• Negotiator for E.ON Ruhrgas in the BGW legal association -group on the first 
cooperation agreement bet ween German network operators.  
• Advisor to the Chief Legal Officer in the preparation of meetings of the Legal 
Committee of the Eurogas Association.  
 
Jan 2001 to Oct 2003 Ruhrgas Aktiengesellschaft, Essen  
Position: Head of European Law  
    
• Advisor  to all departments of the company and its subsidiaries on European 
energy law and on fundamental issues of European law.  
• Drafting of texts on legislative proposals and position papers for the lobbying 
process.  
• Advisor to the Chief Legal Officer in the  preparation of meetings of the Legal 
Committee of the Association Eurogas. Team member for preparations of 
Eurogas board meetings of the Chairman of the Board of Ruhrgas.  
 
Oct 2000 to Dec 2000 Friedrichs Rechtsanwälte, Düsseldorf  
Position: Attorney at law  
• Advisor to national and international commercial clients (focus: national and 
international contract law, private international law).  
 
November 1997 2nd State Law Examination, Düsseldorf   
Oct 1995 to Sept 1997 Legal traineeship Pla cements in the United Kingdom: Waller & 
Co. Solicitors (London), Mercedes Benz (United Kingdom) Limited, Legal Department 
(Milton Keynes).  
 
COMMENT  
 
• Stakeholder manager with national and international experience.  
• Broad network in politics, business and associations based on several years of 
work in Berlin and Brussels.  
• Expertise in the energy industry, energy policy and energy law with a focus on 
the German, European and International Gas Industry.  
• Successful  creation of corporate positions in the political arena, support of 
legislative procedures and individual commercial projects.  
• Experience with political support of business relevant strategies and concrete 
projects in Eastern Europe, especially Russia.  
• Various publications and conference appearances.  
 
Other activities  
Various publications on energy law and energy policy topics. Numerous appearances 
as a speaker at national and international conferences. Guest lecturer at Freie 
Universität Berlin, Master's program "Business, Competition and Regulatory Law" 
(2011 - 2014); Lecturer at Technische Universität Berlin, Master programs "Energy 
Management" and "European and I nternational Energy Law" (since 2015).
